snippet.title: Wizard School Management Sim PC Release Date - The Fool's Apprentice  - New Games 2025
snippet.description:
The Fool’s Apprentice is a wizard academy management simulation where you—an obviously benevolent professor—must manage & cast spells on your many apprentices so that they might study the right spells…  and perhaps even survive the process. 
Some may die, but oh well, can’t save them all!

Releasing on April 14th 2025, from the indie game studio that brought you Apollyon, the occult, narrative RPG; and Skulltide, the skeletal roguelike adventure. Will you build an arcane school fit for the annals of history? Or will the people tear down your towers to reveal the dark experiments found within?

Build the future of magic, today!

🧙 THE FOOL'S APPRENTICE ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3334430?utm_source=ReleaseAnnouncmentFromYoutube&utm_medium=UTMLINKS

Join the Planar Danse Discord: https://discord.gg/9FjN2PbBK6
